_header: Exortum est in love and liss
_description: A Christmas carol with palindromic rhymes — five quatrains (aaab) with refrain and burden: ‘Nowel syng we bothe al and som / Now Rex Pacificus ys ycome’

BodArcSelB26.First Lines:
Exortum est in loue & lysseNow cryst hys grace he gan vs
                    gyffeAnd with hys body vs bouȝt to blysseboþe all and
                    summe…
BodArcSelB26.Last Lines:
…The rent of heuen þat we not mysseBothe alle &
                    summe
